body: `sys` module has a `byteorder` attribute which is a string containing either `big` or `little`. It would be better to stick with that.
body_html: sys module has a byteorder attribute which is a string containing either big or little. It would be better to stick with that.
body_text: sys module has a byteorder attribute which is a string containing either big or little. It would be better to stick with that.
